## What is MetaROR?

:::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
![](figures/metaror_logo.jpg)
:::
  
::: {.column width="70%"}
* Uses Publish-Review-Curate

* Peer reviews preprints

* Avoids binary "accept" or "reject" editorial decisions

:::
::::

## What is MetaROR?{visibility="uncounted"}

:::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
![](figures/metaror_logo.jpg)
:::
  
::: {.column width="70%"}
* Uses Publish-Review-Curate

* Peer reviews preprints

* Avoids binary "accept" or "reject" editorial decisions

* Authors can re-use the _MetaROR_ reviews with a journal

* "the hope of breathing new life into the moribund peer review system" Stuart Macdonald, _Prometheus_
:::
::::



## Why MetaROR?{background-color='white'}

:::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
* Traditional publishers are wrecking the joint

* Wasted time on peer review that is used only once

* Need for greater transparency in publishing
:::
  
::: {.column width="50%"}
![](figures/qss_a_00327_f001.png)
:::
